featured.text: They include a range of bacteria, fungi, and small animals that break down nature’s wastes into ever smaller pieces until all the chemicals are released into the air, the soil, and the water, making them available to other living things.
An eye stye is a small bump, resembling a pimple, that develops when an oil gland at the edge of an eyelid becomes infected by bacteria.
With the light produced by bacteria living there, they communicate with other flashlight fish to avoid getting too close to each other, so that the fish may spread out evenly to get enough food.
Colds are caused by viruses, not bacteria, so taking medicine is absolutely no use at all.
Bacteria can multiply if the water is kept on the shelves for too long or if it is exposed to heat or direct sunlight.

other.text: They are produced when the bacteria digest the food.
When we eat, the bacteria take our food as their food and produce an acid that destroys the surface of the teeth, causing cavities to form.
They help to get rid of some bacteria in the mouth.
They help bacteria to produce tannins.
Besides, chocolate contains tannins, which help to kill some of the bacteria in the mouth.

These bacteria are found in the nose and are easily 18 to the eye when you rub your nose, then your eye.

definition.zh_def: 細菌是一種微小的單細胞生物，通常以無害或有害的形式存在於各種環境中。
definition.en_def: Bacteria are tiny, single-celled organisms that can exist in various environments, often in harmless or harmful forms.
definition.example: Bacteria can be found in soil, water, and even inside the human body.
